creator: Rashidnk
descriptionHtml:
Quran Lite - Quran Malayalam Translation ഖുർആൻ മലയാള വ്യാഖ്യാനം app for android with Malayalam translation

The Quran is the Holly Book of Islam and The Final Revelation to Mankind

This app helps to read and understand Quran in Arabic with its meaning in Malayalam

Features

Audio with translation

Lightweight Pocket Quran App in small size

Quran Malayalam app contains all the 114 chapters in Arabic and Malayalam meaning

Six different Arabic fonts included for comfortable reading

Malayalam Translation for each ayahs

Jump to Ayah number from a chapter

Quran Search: Aya search, Quran malayalam search

View search result chapter wise

Options

Page view : in this mode all the verses displayed one after other, Tap on the ayat to show meaning.

List view : This mode will display the verses and the translation

Themes : Different themes - Blue, Green, Grey and Black

Background : Select Quran page background in different colors

Fonts : Change the arabic font for easy reading

Translation : Show/ Hide translation for page view

Bookmark : Bookmark an ayat, so you can open it from side menu, to delete press and hold bookmark

Audio (Recitation)
Option to auto play audio of surah and aya while reading (using mobile data or wifi )

Permission
No Permission Required

No File download required after the installation, and no internet connection required,

WiFi/Mobile data required for Audio play


Note : This app is for educational purpose, if any mistakes/error found in this app Kindly contact to rashidabunoor@gmail.com


This app built with Quasar Framework. Data From Tanzil Project
descriptionShort: Lightweight Quran Malayalam translation app for android ഖുർആൻ മലയാള വ്യാഖ്യാനം

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Navigation:
* Juz
* Goto links
Audio:
* Audio control
Text:
* Typo fix in translation
